The video of the man removing his burqa: with claims that it showed a Buddhist man masquerading as a Muslim woman involved in the Sri Lanka Church bombing.
The video had a watermark of a website: www.http://nethnews.lk), but a relevant keyword search on this website yielded no results.
Alt News: an investigative organization, contacted a local Sri Lankan journalist who reached out to the owner of the website. The website clarified that the video was actually an old video from August 2018, unrelated to the recent bombings in Sri Lanka.
